summary: Builds calibrated pulse schedules for the RZXGate by adapting the cross‑resonance (CX) gate’s Gaussian‑square pulses, adjusting width or amplitude to achieve the desired rotation angle.
business_intent: Enables precise implementation of arbitrary RZX rotations on quantum hardware by automatically generating appropriate pulse calibrations from existing CX schedules, supporting echoed cross‑resonance gates with optional rotary tones.
